cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1.2)
project(conan-libpqxx)

include(conanbuildinfo.cmake)
conan_basic_setup()

if (WIN32)
    add_definitions(-DWIN32 -D_MBCS -D_WINDOWS -DPQXX_INTERNAL -DNOMINMAX)
endif()

# Execute the `find_package(PostgreSQL REQUIRED)` before configuration libpqxx
# to avoid problem that libraries managed by conan are not linked.
# Because libpqxx overwrites `CMAKE_MODULE_PATH`, `FindPostgreSQL.cmake`
# generated by conan will not used.
find_package(PostgreSQL REQUIRED)

add_subdirectory(source_subfolder)
